    • Controller

      public Controller(org.json.simple.JSONObject gameStatus, List<Client> clients) throws JsonBadParsingException
      This constructor is used to load the state of the game from a jsonfile.
      Parameters:
      gameStatus - JSONObject with the status
      Throws:
      JsonBadParsingException - when a parsing error happens

  • Method Details

    • gameTerminated

      public boolean gameTerminated()
      This method is used to check if the game termination has been handled. In that case, the lobby can be deleted.
      Returns:
      boolean, True if the game is terminated

    • refreshClient

      public void refreshClient(Client client)
      This method is used when there is the need to completely refresh a client. It is used on game loading.
      Parameters:
      client - Client object to update

    • getBoard

      public Board getBoard() throws JsonBadParsingException
      Returns:
      the board
      Throws:
      JsonBadParsingException

    • getCommonGoals

      public List<CommonGoal> getCommonGoals()
      Returns:
      the commonGoals we instantiated in the constructor

    • getPlayers

      public List<Player> getPlayers()
      Returns:
      the players of the match

    • setActivity

      protected void setActivity(String playerName, boolean value) throws ControllerGenericException
      Throws:
      ControllerGenericException

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      increments the turn, if the current player is not active goes on

    • getCurrentPlayerName

      public String getCurrentPlayerName()
      Returns:
      the current player

    • getTurn

      public int getTurn()
      Returns:
      the current turn

    • getShelves

      public Map<String,Shelf> getShelves()
      Returns:
      a map that contains the shelf of each player

    • getFileName

      public static String getFileName(List<String> players)
      This function builds the name of the file used to save the game
      Parameters:
      players - List of players' names
      Returns:
      String, name of the file

    • endGameNotEnoughConnected

      public void endGameNotEnoughConnected()
      This method checks if the amount of connected players is lower that the minSupportedPlayers and if so ends the game

    • moveTiles

      public void moveTiles(String playerName, Move move) throws ControllerGenericException
      insert Tiles in the player shelf according to move coordinates
      Parameters:
      playerName - is the current player
      move - is the move that player wants to do
      Throws:
      ControllerGenericException - if the selected tile is not allowed, if the player is not the current player or if the shelf hasn't enough empty cells

    • prepareForNextPlayer

      protected void prepareForNextPlayer()
      Do all the actions to prepare the board for the next player (Fill the board) It should be manually called before the first and it is called after every player's move.

    • toJson

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject toJson()
      Specified by:
      toJson in interface Jsonable

    • clientDisconnected

      public void clientDisconnected(Client client)
      This function is called by the lobby when a client disconnected. The function removes the client and sets the corresponding player as inactive.
      Parameters:
      client - Client object
      Throws:
      ControllerGenericException - when there is no client or no player matching the provided object.

    • clientReconnected

      public void clientReconnected(Client client)
      This function is called by the lobby when a client connects after a crash. The function adds the client and sets the corresponding player as active.
      Parameters:
      client - Client object
      Throws:
      ControllerGenericException - when there is no player with the provided name.

    • setTurn_testing_only

      protected void setTurn_testing_only(String playerName)
      WARNING: this method should be used only for testing purposes. This method is used to set the player currently playing.
      Parameters:
      playerName - name of the player to set as current player
